title: Vayne or Ahri
body: I almost have 4800 ip and I'm looking for a strong and very fun champ who can carry. I enjoy every role and am trying to decide between buying either vayne or ahri.

replies.body:
Ahri all the way.

Trust me once you start making those amazingly satisfying flashy plays with her your gonna wonder why you didn't buy her earlier.

That being said Vayne is also quite fun and rewarding, but she's a bit more hardcore with her short range and dashes. and isn't as fun as AHRII.
Ahri was the first champ I ever purchased and for 3 years has been my favorite champ. I will always say ahri

Let me tell you right now. Vayne is not fun. She is cool to play sometimes but she is very short range and can get punished easily. If you want a picka nd go mindless kind of fun, Ahri is your girl.

I played an Ahri support game and went off. Now that was fun.

Mate... so much fun. . Ive played har top tank mid support and adc... time to try jungle ahri

Ahri has been one of the top 5 best mid laners in Solo Queue for like, collectively an entire season, not to mention she's been top 3 for most of that time and is probably the best right now, again. She's also nowhere near as contested as Gosuliftlet, and is probably the most versatile mid laner in the entire game. I think you know the correct choice bud.

Pretty sure it's written as a statistical fact somewhere that Ahri is the most superior champion in the entire game.
Thanks do you think she'll get nerfed?

No, not anytime in the near future. Because even though she is very strong, she IS balanced. There's also a very obvious difference between a good Ahri and a bad Ahri so while she is a rather simplistic champion mechanically, she requires a fair amount of experience

She's already been nerfed a couple times but she's still really strong. I don't think so unless she gets to where she was before her latest nerf. It's like a cycle, a champion gets nerfed, suddenly it's difficult to play until you figure that champion out again, then it becomes strong again once you've figured that champion out after the nerf. At least that's how I see it.

I'd definitely say Ahri is top pick if you're looking for a fun champion... coming from an Ahri main (not biased at all).

VAYNE:
PROS: Tons of Damage, Can carry if played well, Good Skins, Nightmare if she gets fed
CONS: Difficult to learn, lot of mechanics needed to perform, Sterotypes by players :(

AHRI:
PROS: Easy-ish to play (2 SkillShots), Fun to Play, Has good pick with her Charm
CONS: Fairly skill-shot reliant, Kinda hard to CS with, Only a few good skins IMO

I hope this helped in some way, I know you said you enjoy every role but you should decide on 1 'main' role and 1 secondary roles of prepare yourself for ranked. If you play more ADC than Mid I personally would go Vayne just becuase I would be somewhat better on her than if I didn't play a lot of ADC and vice-versa if I played more Mid and ADC. Cheers {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Thanks, my fav role is probably jungle.

Ahri is really fun with the right items, but Vayne once you master is really OP and fun. I am an Ahri player but I find Vayne very fun. But in my opinoin, Ahri is the one you should have! :){{champion:103}}

Thank you so much :)

Who is funner?

Don't even bother with Vayne until your at least Silver. Ahri is the way to go, not to mention way funner. For Vayne you have to be focused, and she takes a lot of game knowledge and mechanics, which is why she is only fun for really talented players and not casuals looking for fun.
